content: Hello, I have implemented Fhir project in spring version 4.3.0.RELEASE and application server webshpere 8.5. But is giving memory error after running. Do I need to add any dependency in pom.xml.

Thanks for your response. This is not a question about HAPI.
Actually I am getting out of memory error after running on webshere 8.5 but it works on Tomcat server.
Do I need to add any dependency in pom.xml to run it on websphere 8.5 ?

then what are you asking about? FHIR is an API specification. You are asking about some specific software, without even identifying it. See http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Rules_for_asking_questions
Sorry, I will take care it from future.
